items.content_html: A simple, lightweight, and easy to use HTTP streaming library for BunnyCDN.
items.title: dan-online/bunnycdn-stream: A simple, lightweight, and easy to use HTTP streaming library for BunnyCDN.

items.content_html: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.
items.title: Tunmiseoni/node-csv-miniDB: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: Milo is a lightweight, file-based HTTP framework designed for Deno. It simplifies the process of creating and managing HTTP routes and WebSocket connections by dynamically generating routes from the filesystem.
items.title: Nikolaycc/Milo: Milo is a lightweight, file-based HTTP framework designed for Deno. It simplifies the process of creating and managing HTTP routes and WebSocket connections by dynamically generating routes from the filesystem.

items.content_html: S3KV is a lightweight TypeScript package that provides a JSON key-value store built on top of AWS S3 and CloudFront.

items.content_html: zli is a lightweight command-line interface (CLI) framework built on top of Zod, a TypeScript-first schema validation library. It allows you to create robust, type-safe CLI applications with ease.

items.content_html: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.
items.title: GLINCKER/glinui: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.
